code: import React from"react";import{FaChevronDown}from"react-icons/fa";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Controls=_ref=>{let{total,size,sort,onChangePageSize,onChangeSort,currentPage=1}=_ref;const actualCurrentPage=Math.max(1,currentPage);const showingStart=(actualCurrentPage-1)*size+1;const showingEnd=Math.min(actualCurrentPage*size,total);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pagination-info",children:["Showing ",showingStart," - ",showingEnd," of ",total]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filter-sort-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"control-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"show-per-page",children:"Show per page:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"select-with-icon",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{id:"show-per-page",value:size,onChange:e=>onChangePageSize(+e.target.value),children:[10,20,50].map(num=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:num,children:num},num))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaChevronDown,{className:"dropdown-icon"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"control-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"sort-by",children:"Sort by:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"select-with-icon",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{id:"sort-by",value:sort,onChange:e=>onChangeSort(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"-published_at",children:"Newest"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"published_at",children:"Oldest"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaChevronDown,{className:"dropdown-icon"})]})]})]})]});};export default Controls;
